definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.chinese: 拉爾夫疑惑地看了看他。

sentences.english: Ralph, Jr. plops down on couch and sighs with satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 小拉爾夫撲通一聲坐在沙發椅上，滿意地嘆了口氣。

sentences.english: Still, I just HAD TO give a thumbs up to any mention of Ralph Kramden.
sentences.chinese: 不過我還是要對你提到拉爾夫表示讚許。

sentences.english: Ralph, Jr. unrolls a poster of the Marines and tacks it on the wall of his room.
sentences.chinese: 小拉爾夫打開一張艦隊海報貼在自己臥室的牆上。

sentences.english: Ralph was luxuriating in the first real holiday he'd had in years.
sentences.chinese: 拉爾夫那時正在盡情享受多年來的第一次真正假期。

sentences.english: Ralph says Kevin's "voice is so monotone that it lulls me to sleep every time I hear it."
sentences.chinese: 拉爾夫說凱文的聲音太單調，每次聽到都想睡覺。

sentences.english: Ralf sometimes wouldn't mind, if rather Takuma Sato was his brother instead…
sentences.chinese: 有時候，拉爾夫不介意佐藤是他兄弟會更好一點。

sentences.english: Ralph Lauren ( RL - news - people ) has one of the most dynamic and interactive Web sites out there.
sentences.chinese: 拉爾夫勞倫的網站是最動態和互動的一家。

sentences.english: You insulted Ralph when you called him a pig.
sentences.chinese: 你管拉爾夫叫豬，你侮辱了他。

sentences.english: She wrote to Ralph and acquainted him with my conduct; this occasioned a breach between us .
sentences.chinese: 她寫信告訴拉爾夫我的行狀，這使我們之間有了隔閡。

sentences.english: Ralph , Jr. looks back at her and laughs idiotically.
sentences.chinese: 小拉爾夫回頭看着她，傻傻地哈哈大笑起來。

sentences.english: The male sniffs the air and catches sight of Ralph , Jr.
sentences.chinese: 公獅子鼻子往空中一嗅，看到了小拉爾夫。

sentences.english: Ralph's lips formed a word but no sound came.
sentences.chinese: 拉爾夫嘴脣在翕動，但沒有聲音出來。

sentences.english: Ralph, Sr . chokes on his whiskey at the sound of the scream.
sentences.chinese: 大拉爾夫正在喝威士忌酒，聽到尖叫聲，嗆了一口。

sentences.english: Krantz and Ralph arrive and find that the briefcase is empty.
sentences.chinese: “將軍”和拉爾夫到達了，發現箱子是空的。

sentences.english: As for her, she felt as though Ralph were a member of her family.
sentences.chinese: 至於她來說，她覺的拉爾夫彷彿是她的一位親人。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Nelson or Nillson (name)/Horatio Nelson (1758-1805), British naval hero
Handel (name)/George Frideric Handel (1685-1759), German-born Baroque composer, naturalized British in 1727
Klein or Kline (name)/Felix Klein (1849-1925), German mathematician
